params._avatar: The address of the Avatar controlling this proxy.
params._router: The address of the Uniswap router through which this proxy will interact with UniswapV2.

params._amount: The amount of `_from` token to swap.
params._expected: The minimum amount of `_to` token to expect in return for the swap [reverts otherwise].
params._from: The address of the token to swap from [address(0) for ETH].
params._to: The address of the token to swap to [address(0) for ETH].

devdoc.title: A UniswapV2 proxy made with  for the necDAO folks
